name: Bullet Guy
description:
"You only got one life, sunny boy!

    Promise me,  don't throw it away.."

He said right before, he was called upon.

Game:

You are playing a Bullet, who loves spending time with his dad.

Yet the fear of being called soon grows inside you.

That is until your dad get's called and they took him away.

After time passes, your time comes.

You can't stay in the place you call home.

It is time to find a new home, out there.

What will lie on the other side of the place you call home?

Will you even make it to the other side?

Controls:

Use W and S or Up and Down to navigate your player up and down.

Change places with D and A or Left and Right to avoid obstacles.

To slow down, use Space or Shift, but be aware there is a timer on those buttons, which soon sets your speed back to normal.

Press Esc at any time in game to close the game. (should be at the top left of your keyboard)

!!Wish you all Fun playing!!

Feedback would also be really nice :)
